data.SOURCE:
@AbapCatalog.viewEnhancementCategory: [#NONE]
@AccessControl.authorizationCheck: #NOT_REQUIRED
@EndUserText.label: 'Onay Ekran覺 Verileri'
@Metadata.ignorePropagatedAnnotations: true
@ObjectModel.usageType:{
    serviceQuality: #X,
    sizeCategory: #S,
    dataClass: #MIXED
}
define view entity YI_PYM_DDL_APPROV_DOWNPAY_DATA
  as select from ypym_t_approve                 as approve
    inner join   YI_PYM_DDL_downpay_HEADER_INFO as header on header.paymentnumber = approve.paymentnumber
    inner join   YI_PYM_DDL_downpay_AMOUNT      as amount on amount.paymentnumber = approve.paymentnumber
    association[1..*] to YI_PYM_DDL_downpay_ALL_DATA as _items on _items.Paymentnumber = approve.paymentnumber
{
  key approve.paymentnumber,
      @EndUserText.label: 'Liste Tarihi'
      header.listdate,
      header.companycode,      
      @Semantics.amount.currencyCode: 'currency'
      amount.paymentamount,
      amount.currency,
      header.paymentrequestdate,
      approve.approvergroupsequence,
      _items
}
where
      approve.approver          = $session.user
  and approve.approvementstatus = 'INPROCESS'

union

select from  ypym_t_proxyapp                as proxy
  inner join ypym_t_approve                 as approve on approve.approver = proxy.approver
  inner join YI_PYM_DDL_downpay_HEADER_INFO as header  on header.paymentnumber = approve.paymentnumber
  inner join YI_PYM_DDL_downpay_AMOUNT      as amount  on amount.paymentnumber = approve.paymentnumber
  association[1..*] to YI_PYM_DDL_downpay_ALL_DATA as _items on _items.Paymentnumber = approve.paymentnumber
{
  key approve.paymentnumber,
      header.listdate,
      header.companycode,      
      amount.paymentamount,
      amount.currency,
      header.paymentrequestdate,
      approve.approvergroupsequence,
      _items
}
where
        proxy.proxyapprover       = $session.user
  and(
        proxy.begindate           <= $session.system_date
    and proxy.enddate             >= $session.system_date
  )
  and   approve.approvementstatus = 'INPROCESS'

"YPYM_T_PROXYAPP"
],
"ASSOCIATED":
[
"YI_PYM_DDL_DOWNPAY_ALL_DATA"
],

}
